acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field 5Zyped8Ccg cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 94 byteObjectField = 53 shortField = 81 shortObjectField = 55 charField = d charObjectField = o intField = -593982576 intObjectField = 499589382 longField = 753732464472145 longObjectField = 753732463320398 floatField = 0.7175866 floatObjectField = 0.55263865 doubleField = 0.7937103239775475 doubleObjectField = 0.977361298706102 stringField = FbicAR3bGj objectField = java.lang.Object@25becefb calendarField = Fri Jul 10 00:17:35 BST 2015 dateField = Fri Jul 10 00:17:35 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@7e86f9ba intArray = [I@28b11473 booleanArray = [Z@354ec60 bigDecimalField = 489767009878 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element
